text: 1.20: Ro 5.1; 2 Ko 5.18; Ef 1.7; 1.10; 2.13; 2.16; 1 Zo 2.2Fhe Bakɨme za kha nuianan ki bigi gum Hevenan ki bigir muuŋgirim, nta za ana phorgɨp ndava bavira kɨrgeŋ vuzvugi. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap fhura Krais garim, ana khanarareŋ ga ntorgap rimgi. Ana khanarareŋ ga ntorgim, ana vɨzɨn siasuagim, Fhe Bakɨme nza panan ana kegi tɨvi, ana nta mbevigim, nza ana phorgap ndava bavira ki.
